scripts.backend-deploy: cd udagram/udagram-api && eb init udacity-adham-udagram -r $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -p node.js && eb use udacity-api && eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST DB_PORT=$DB_PORT PORT=$PORT POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET && eb deploy
scripts.frontend-deploy: aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read udagram/udagram-frontend/www s3://adham-udagram
